Constructor for objects of class Tree

Parameters:
initUpperLeftXValue - The Upper Left X coordinate of the rectangle, representing the tree-trunk
initUpperLeftYValue - The Upper Left Y coordinate of the rectangle, representing the tree-trunk
initWidth - The Width of the rectangle representing the tree-trunk
initHeight - The Height of the rectangle representing the tree-trunk
initBranchNum - The amount of branches grown onto the tree-shape
